CustomField.formula: IF(Course_Type__c="Theory" && TEXT(Theory_Secured_Marks__c) <> "" && TEXT(Quiz_Secured_marks__c) <> "" && TEXT(Seminar_Secured_Marks__c) <> "", "Completed", IF(Course_Type__c="Theory" && (TEXT(Theory_Secured_Marks__c) == "" || TEXT(Quiz_Secured_marks__c) == "" || TEXT(Seminar_Secured_Marks__c) == ""), "In Progress", IF(Course_Type__c="Practical" && TEXT(Knowledge_of_Exercise_Secured_Marks__c) <> "" && TEXT(Execution_of_Exercise_Secured_Marks__c) <> "" && TEXT(Description_of_Experiment_Secured_Mark__c) <> "" && TEXT(Viva_Voce_Practical_Secured_Marks__c) <> "" && TEXT(Punctuality_Secured_Marks__c) <> "" && TEXT(Results_Secured_Marks__c) <> "", "Completed", IF(Course_Type__c="Practical" && (TEXT(Knowledge_of_Exercise_Secured_Marks__c) == "" || TEXT(Execution_of_Exercise_Secured_Marks__c) == "" || TEXT(Description_of_Experiment_Secured_Mark__c) == "" || TEXT(Viva_Voce_Practical_Secured_Marks__c) == "" || TEXT(Punctuality_Secured_Marks__c) == "" || TEXT(Results_Secured_Marks__c) <> ""), "In Progress", IF(Course_Type__c="Project" && TEXT(Selection_of_Topic_Secured_Marks__c) <> "" && TEXT(Analysis_and_Synthesis_Secured_Marks__c) <> "" && TEXT(Literature_Survey_Secured_Marks__c) <> "" && TEXT(Ethical_Attitude_Secured_Marks__c) <> "" && TEXT(Independent_Learning_Secured_Marks__c) <> "" && TEXT(Oral_Presentation_Secured_Marks__c) <> "" && TEXT(Report_Writing_Secured_Marks__c) <> "" && TEXT(Continuous_Learning_Secured_Marks__c) <> "", "Completed", IF(Course_Type__c="Project" && (TEXT(Selection_of_Topic_Secured_Marks__c) == "" || TEXT(Analysis_and_Synthesis_Secured_Marks__c) == "" || TEXT(Literature_Survey_Secured_Marks__c) == "" || TEXT(Ethical_Attitude_Secured_Marks__c) == "" || TEXT(Independent_Learning_Secured_Marks__c) == "" || TEXT(Oral_Presentation_Secured_Marks__c) == "" || TEXT(Report_Writing_Secured_Marks__c) == "" || TEXT(Continuous_Learning_Secured_Marks__c) == ""), "In Progress", ""))))))
CustomField.label: IA Marks Update Satus
